name: Crab Apple Kids
overview:
Crab Apple Kids is an online children’s clothing boutique stocking over 75 designer brands of the most enchanting, trend-setting names in baby clothing, toddler clothing and kids clothing for boys and girls.

The company stocks a large selection girl’s clothing, specializing in boy’s clothing because they understand how hard it is to find boy’s clothes that aren’t limited to t-shirts. They also specialize in family collections. These are ideal if you have twins or multiple children of differing ages and want to dress them in outfits that have a similar look and feel, while not being completely identical. This way both mom and the children are happy! And last, but certainly not least, be sure to check out their wide selection of heirloom quality Christening/Baptism gowns, dresses and outfits. The detail on these are absolutely stunning – zoom in on the product photos to see it.

At Crab Apple Kids you will find the hottest in kids clothes labels, including Anita G, Biscotti, BT Kids, Cach Cach, Corky & Company, Harley Davidson, Hartstrings, Haute Baby, Indygo, Kapital K, Kate Mack, Katie Rose, Kidorable, Knuckleheads, LeTop, Lipstik, Little Maven, Me Me Me, Nano, Oopsy Daisy Baby, Vitamins Baby and many more.
